mapper.sql: inkind_id AS "inkindId", pick_lists_detail_id AS "pickListsDetailId",received_number AS "receivedNumber",brand_id AS "brandId",status AS "status",storehouse_positions_id AS "storehousePositionsId",storehouse_id AS "storehouseId",pick_lists_id AS "pickListsId", sku_id AS "skuId", number AS "number", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"

a . storehouse_positions_id AS "storehousePositionsId", a.storehouse_id AS "storehouseId", a.pick_lists_detail_id AS "pickListsDetailId", a.pick_lists_id AS "pickListsId", a.brand_id AS "brandId", a.sku_id AS "skuId", a.number AS "number", a.create_user AS "createUser", a.update_user AS "updateUser", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.display AS "display", a.status AS "status", a.deptId AS "deptId"

DISTINCTROW a.inkind_id AS "inkindId", a.pick_lists_detail_id AS "pickListsDetailId", a.received_number AS "receivedNumber", a.brand_id AS "brandId", a.STATUS AS "status", a.storehouse_positions_id AS "storehousePositionsId", a.storehouse_id AS "storehouseId", a.pick_lists_id AS "pickListsId", a.sku_id AS "skuId", a.number AS "number", a.create_user AS "createUser", a.update_user AS "updateUser", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.display AS "display", a.deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_production_pick_lists_detail where 1 = 1
and pick_lists_detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.pickListsDetailId},'%')
and pick_lists_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.pickListsId},'%')
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
